info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 2:15PM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Western Siskiyou County, including Happy Camp, Somes Bar, Fort Jones, Etna, Callahan, Seiad Valley, and Sawyers Bar. Winter impacts are expected for all area roads and highways. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions.
